name: Freddie Dredd
description: '''Ryan Mitchel Chassels''' (born September 19, 1997), known professionally as '''Freddie Dredd''', is a Canadian rapper, singer, producer and songwriter. He gained prominence on [[TikTok]] with several viral songs including "GTG", "Opaul", "Limbo" and "Cha Cha". Dredd is a member of the music collective Sixset and his music is released with [[RCA Records]] and Doomshop.
